titleStmt.title: The saints fulnesse of joy in their fellowship with God presented in a sermon preached July 21. 1646. before the Honorable House of Commons in Margarets Westminster, being the day appointed for thankesgiving for the surrender of Oxford. By the least of saints, and the meanest of the ministers of the Gospel, W. Cradock.
titleStmt.author: Cradock, Walter, 1606?-1659.

titleStmt.title: The saints fulnesse of joy in their fellowship with God presented in a sermon preached July 21. 1646. before the Honorable House of Commons in Margarets Westminster, being the day appointed for thankesgiving for the surrender of Oxford. By the least of saints, and the meanest of the ministers of the Gospel, W. Cradock.
titleStmt.author: Cradock, Walter, 1606?-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Matthew Simmons, and are to be sold by George VVhittington, at the blew Anchor neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Verso of first leaf contains author's appointment to print, with reference to a Parliamentary order to print.
Running title reads: A sermon preached at the late thanksgiving, before the Commons House of Parliament.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
